text: The Buffalo Bisons (also known as the Germans) were an American basketball team based in Buffalo, New York that was a member of the American Basketball League. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |1925/26 |ABL |9th (1st half); 6th (2nd half) |Did not qualify |} Category:Sports in Buffalo, New York Category:Basketball teams in New York (state) Category:Defunct basketball teams in the United States
title: Buffalo Bisons (ABL)
